Sentencas: Ti3SiC2 has been known as a remarkable material for a myriad of applications because it displays both metallic and ceramic properties.

Sentencas: Like metals, it has excellent electrical and thermal conductivities, high toughness, high fatigue-crack growth threshold, low hardness, machinability, and high-thermal shock resistance.

Sentencas: Like ceramics, it displays excellent chemical resistance, high Young's modulus, high temperature strength and high melting point.
